name: Airship vs. Abomination
description:
You are the captain of an airship. During a mission in the great unknown, you saw the time and space continuum get ripped in half, emerging from the rift was an abomination with thousands of eyes and mouths. You are not a battle ship, but you have a full cargo of giant roses seed which can grow on rifts and attack for you. There is no hope of you surviving, but you won't go down without a fight. Dodge the bullets and rips using your mouse movement, and plant your roses using left click.

The game was made in ~3 days as a challenge with a friend, we both had to make games based on the words "Roses" and "Airship", we had to do every assets ourselves, including audio.
